job description:
Description:
Are you a Data Analyst with a strong ability to multi-task? Are you a Data Analyst ready to start a position ASAP with a well-established company?

Our client has been in business for well over 100 years and is one of the largest companies in their industry. They are committed to delivering innovative products and strive to provide a great working environment for their employees.

WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING:

As a Data Analyst, you will maintain customer master data in company software, assist users with questions and requests, troubleshoot related issues, run reports, analyst and resolve data issues, and assist with additional duties as needed.

Requirements:
  • Good technical ability
  • On the job data entry experience is a plus
  • Ability to toggle between multiple screens
  • Accurate data entry skills
  • Comfortable working within Excel
Hours: 8:00am – 4:30pm or 9:00am – 5:30pm

Pay for the Data Analyst position: $12.00 / hr.

Location: Appleton, WI

Job I.D. 134244

WHAT YOU GET:
  • Clean, open environment
  • Casual dress code
  • Free coffee
Job descriptions may not include every responsibility or qualification of the position.

Equal Opportunity Employer of Minorities, Females, Protected Veterans and Individuals with Disabilities.
